channel.title: Mounting uif files
channel.description:
hello its been so long since ive done this so long in fact that magicISO has been taken off my pc.. lol any way i downloaded a torrent and i got these instructions in a .txt file
Install Notes:
1. Burn or Mount with MagicISO.
2. Install it.
3. Generate serial no by "crack/keygen.exe", and register the software with the serial no.
4. Enjoy it.
can anyone refresh my memory? [br][size=1]Posted on: July 28, 2007, 04:47:41 PM[/size][hr]done easer than i remembered when you actually get magiciso lol

item.title: Mounting uif files
item.dc:creator: @nator123123 nator123123
item.description:
@nator123123 wrote:

Open an ISO reader, open the uif file with it, and then extract a virtual disk and mount the uif file on to that disk.

Read full topic

item.title: Mounting uif files
item.dc:creator: @N00b1 N00b1
item.description:
@N00b1 wrote:

yeah just i downloaded flash cs3 in uif format but soon as i got it i forgot how to mount it but then soon as i downloaded magiciso and looked at it i remembered how to do it

Read full topic

item.title: Mounting uif files
item.dc:creator: @Schizzo Schizzo
item.description:
@Schizzo wrote:

I’m not sure what you need to know exactly either. If you download MagicISO (download the free trial version or just get a cracked version or something from a torrent), you should be able to open/mount the file and install it. After that, when you’re asked for the serial number for whatever you’re installing, open the keygen program and generate a serial number.

Read full topic
